description: Cook down ripe summer berries to make this sweet, syrupy compote, perfect for serving with pancakes or ice cream.
keywords: Compote & coulis,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Cherry,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Fresh Berry Compote With Vanilla & Thyme Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 vanilla pod, split and seeds scraped
100g dark cherries, stoned and halved weight

recipeInstructions.text: Put the sugar, vanilla pod, thyme, and 2 tbsp water in a medium, heavybased saucepan, stir together, and bring to the boil. Add the blackberries and cherries, reduce the heat and simmer, covered, for 8-10 minutes, until the berries start to break down and release their juices.

Remove the lid, add the blueberries, increase the heat, and continue to cook the compote for a further 810 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened and reduced, and the berries are soft.
Remove from the heat and cool. Remove the vanilla pod and thyme before serving cold, or at room temperature.
